info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fulton, southeastern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springfield, or 10 miles south of Little Falls, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Canajoharie, Fonda, Fort Plain, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Oppenheim, Fultonville, Palatine Bridge, Nelliston, Cook Corners, Salt Springville, Mindenville, Davys Corners, Fical Corners, Ripple Corners, McKinley, West Saint Johnsville, Sand Hill and Newkirk. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
